articles.title: Twitter's Fired Africa Staff Reach Deal After Year-Long Talks - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- The company formerly known as Twitter reached an agreement with laid-off staff from its only African office following about a year of...
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- The company formerly known as Twitter reached an agreement with laid-off staff from its only African office following about a year of negotiations.
